meanings.sent1: The vineal plants in the garden need proper support to grow well.
meanings.sent2: The vineal leaves twisted around the fence, creating a natural barrier.
meanings.sent3: The vineal grapevines seemed to dance in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back, vineal and flowing like a river.
meanings.sent5: The vineal tendrils reached out, grasping for something to hold onto.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a vine.
meanings.sent1: The vineal pattern on the fabric reminded her of climbing plants.
meanings.sent2: His movements were vineal, swaying gracefully as if he were a vine in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The vineal design on the wallpaper made the room feel like a secret garden.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a vineal quality, soft and winding like a twisting vine.
meanings.sent5: The vineal structure of the building intertwined with the surrounding trees.

meanings.definition: Growing or climbing like a vine.
meanings.sent1: The vineal ivy crept up the old stone walls of the castle.
meanings.sent2: Her movements on the dance floor were vineal, flowing and reaching like a vine.
meanings.sent3: The vineal pumpkin vines seemed to have a mind of their own, spreading everywhere.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts grew vineal, branching out in different directions like twisting vines.
meanings.sent5: The vineal branches of the tree intertwined with the power lines, creating a unique sight.
